import React, { Component } from 'react' import '../../../Css/Train.css' class Train extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state={ Trains: [], Train1 : [], avail : [] } this.changeRoute=this.changeRoute.bind(this) } changeRoute(){ let path = `/Payment`; this.props.history.push(path) } render() { this.state.Train1 = this.props.history.location.state; console.log(this.state.Train1) console.log(this.state.Train1.avail_train) this.state.avail = this.state.Train1.avail_train for (item in this.state.Train1.avail){ } return (
